title: Jonathan Ashworth – 2021 Comments on NHS Face Masks Not Meeting Requirements
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jonathan Ashworth, the Shadow Health and Social Care Secretary, on 23 February 2021.
content: This is yet another example of ministers buying duff PPE that is inadequate for protecting our hardworking NHS staff. Ministers should apologise and ensure every penny for every piece of unusable PPE is recovered.
